nodes.name: Set Record Status to AI Writing (Airtable)

assignments.name: sectionPrompt
assignments.value:
=###Brand Details###
Brand voice: {{ $('GET Airtable Record').item.json.fields['Brand Voice Guidelines (from Brand Assets)'][0] }}.
Exclude these words & phrases: {{ $('GET Airtable Record').item.json.fields['Excluded Words & Phrases (from Brand Assets)'][0] }}.
Write at a {{ $('GET Airtable Record').item.json.fields['Writing Grade Level (from Brand Assets)'][0] }} grade level.

###Context###
Blogpost Title: {{ $('GET Airtable Record').item.json.fields['Blogpost Title'] }}.
Blogpost Type: {{ $('GET Airtable Record').item.json.fields['packagedTemplatePromptText Rollup (from Prompt Library)'] }}.
Transcript: {{ $('GET Airtable Record').item.json.fields['Transcript Or Context (All Workflows) CLEANED'] }}.

###Instruction###
Write an award winning article. Your task is to write one section and one section only.
Your output should be in {{ $('GET Airtable Record').item.json.fields['Language (from Brand Assets)'][0] }} language.
---
{{ $json.mergedSection }}

nodes.name: Convert Section Prompt output into JSON

assignments.name: SetOutline
assignments.value:
=###Context###
Title: {{ $json.fields['Content Title (ID)'] }}.
PrimaryKeyword: {{ $json.fields['SEO Keyword(s)'] }}.
Internal Links: {{ $json.fields['Blogpost Internal Links'] }}.
ExternalLinks: {{ $json.fields['Blogpost External Links'] }}.
More context about article: {{ $json.fields['Transcript Or Context (All Workflows) CLEANED'] }}.
Blogpost Type: {{ $json.fields['packagedTemplatePromptText Rollup (from Prompt Library)'] }}

###Instruction###
Your task is to prepare an article outline for the context provided.
Your output should be in {{ $json.fields['Language (from Brand Assets)'][0] }} language. Your output must be written in Markdown format (atx). Remember, this is just an outline, you should add bulletpoints of what to cover in each section, not write the section. The headline must begin with #, but then ensure each of the other sections begin with ##, instead of just #
